title: LF Top/Jungle Main PLAT+
body:
Hello Summoners,

We are currently looking for some people to dynamic ranked queue with! You must be around Plat V or above and must be able to communicate with the team in a sensible and proper manner. If you have any queries, my IGN is "Not Kier".

One requirement is to tell me your favourite meme kappa.

LETS GET TO DIAMOND YO!

replies.body: Hey mate, sent you an in game request. I'm a skilled jungler / top player. Great at ganks and baiting for ganks while I'm in lane. Looking for some smarter players than the pubs to climb with.
